entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming clear before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
